pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, November 1, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, November 1, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:15 p.m.


12:50 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Dr. Homa Hoodfar.

Queen’s Room, Prime Minister’s Office
Center Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


1:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the National Youth Forum on Accessibility and participate in a Q&A session.

Carleton University
Residence Commons Building, Fenn Lounge
1125 Colonel By Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:45 p.m.


PMO Media Relations: 
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
